text: Dragan Holcer (19 January 1945 - 23 September 2015) was a Croatian football defender. He played for FK Radnički Niš, HNK Hajduk Split, VfB Stuttgart, FC Schalke 04 and the Yugoslavia national team. Holcer was born in a Nazi prison camp in Zwiesel, Bavaria, Germany. His mother was Austrian-Italian and his father was Slovenian. Holcer died on 23 September 2015 in Split, aged 70. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Croatian footballers Category:Yugoslavian footballers
